articles.title: When Aston Martin CEO Treated Elon Musk Like An "Amateur Car Builder" - NDTV
articles.description: Elon Musk's Tesla is today counted among the world's most valuable car companies, but there was once a time when the billionaire entrepreneur was treated like an "amateur car builder" by the CEO of one of the world's leading luxury car manufacturers.
articles.content:
Elon Musk visited the Aston Martin factory in 2008.
